title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 650.5 - Preliminary qualifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 650.5 - Preliminary qualifications

State Regulations
A chief operator or assistant/shift operator shall be
physically capable of performing his/her duties, shall possess a high school
diploma or high school equivalency diploma, and shall produce evidence
acceptable to the appointing authority as to his/her character and ability to
maintain and operate properly all equipment entrusted to his/her
care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
650.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
